summary: "When Harry Met Sally..." is a 1989 romantic comedy about two friends, Harry and Sally, who wonder if men and women can be just friends. It stars Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan. The story idea came from real-life experiences, and much of the dialogue is based on the friendship between the director and Crystal. The film was a hit, making $92.8 million and receiving critical acclaim. It's now considered a classic comedy and was even turned into a stage play.
title: When Harry Met Sally...
